title: Imprisoned in Stone
description: For the crime of healing without payment, the Brethren imprisoned Dylan’s soul in stone. After centuries, he felt the touch of another’s mind and hope for escape from his eternal prison soars. However, his potential savor’s is unaware of her latent magic--and her only knowledge of him comes from an eerie message on the wall and nightmarish dreams.A spell kept secret for generations.A brotherhood thirsting for power.Demands that cannot be obeyed.And in the middle of it all-- a woman who stands to lose everything.
author: Helen B. Henderson
